description: CronClusterScan is a specification for a CronClusterScan resource

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: Spec defines the desired state of CronClusterScan

benchmarks.description: Benchmarks is the type of ClusterScan that need to be executed

items.description: ClusterScanType represent the type of benchmarks. We only have two types at this time.

schedule.description: The schedule in Cron format, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cron.

suspend.description: This flag tells the controller to suspend subsequent executions, it does not apply to already started executions.  Defaults to false.

status.description: Status defines the observed state of CronClusterScan

lastScheduleTime.description: Information when was the last time the job was successfully scheduled.
